TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MimeParameterWriter extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeFormatter
Public MustInherit Class MimeParameterWriter Inherits MimeFormatter

summary.span: 为使用 HTTP 实现但不支持 SOAP 的 Web 服务客户端提供传出请求参数编写器的通用基实现。

span.span: Provides a common base implementation for writers of out-going request parameters for Web service clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间中的其他类 通过 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作支持 Web 服务的 .NET Framework 实现。 and other classes in the namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web 服务编写器和读取器分别在参数或返回 Web 方法的对象和 HTTP 请求或响应流之间进行序列化和反序列化。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web 服务编写器和读取器使用 HTTP 进行传输，但不使用 SOAP 标准交换消息。Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. 类建立一种常见的请求写入格式，用于客户端向 HTTP 请求流中写入 Web 方法参数。The class establishes a common request-writing format for client-side writing of Web method parameters into HTTP request streams. 通常不需要 直接使用或其子类。You will typically not need to use or its descendant classes directly. 相反，当 Wsdl.exe 工具根据 HTTP GET 或 HTTP POST 实现生成客户端代理代码时，它会将应用于 每个 Web 方法，并将该特性的 属性设置为相应的类型。Instead, when the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST implementations, it applies the to each Web method and sets the attribute's property to the appropriate type.

param.name: url
param.span: HTTP 请求的原始统一资源定位符 (URL)。

span.span: The HTTP request's original Uniform Resource Locator (URL).

param.name: parameters
param.span: 要添加到 URL 中的 Web 方法参数值（如果需要）。

span.span: The Web method parameter values to be added to the URL, if necessary.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，修改传出 HTTP 请求的统一请求定位符 (URL)。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, modifies the outgoing HTTP request's Uniform Request Locator (URL).

returns.span: 一个 对象，包含已修改的传出 HTTP 请求的统一请求定位符 (URL)。

span.span: A object that contains the modified, outgoing HTTP request's Uniform Request Locator (URL).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自的类的 仅 修改 HTTP 请求 URL。Of the classes derived from , only modifies the HTTP request URL.

span.span: The encoding used to write parameters to the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由类表示的编码定义了 如何将字符转换为一个字节序列。An encoding, as represented by the class, defines how to transform characters into a sequence of bytes.

span.span: if the Web method parameter values are serialized to the out-going HTTP request body; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否 调用方法。The property determines whether the method is invoked. 类的实现返回的 值 `false` 。The class's implementation of returns a value of `false`. 重写的唯一派生类 是 ，其实现返回值 `true` 。The only derived class that overrides is , whose implementation returns a value of `true`.
